wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Edward Booth (25 April 1874 – 7 September 1939) was an English footballer who played at centre-half for Blackburn Rovers and Everton. He also made two appearances for England in March 1898 and April 1903.

response: * 25 April – Tom Booth (d. 1939), England international; over 100 appearances for Blackburn Rovers and Everton.
